law.catch_line: Unified and integrated prosecutor system established.
law.text: It is hereby declared to be the policy of this Commonwealth to encourage cooperation among law enforcement officers and to provide for the general supervision of criminal justice by the Attorney General as chief law enforcement officer of the Commonwealth, in order to maintain uniform and efficient enforcement of the criminal law and the administration of criminal justice throughout the Commonwealth. To this end, a unified and integrated prosecutor system is hereby established with the Attorney General as chief prosecutor of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 1, effective January 1, 1978.
